description:
⁣⁣
MY PAGE LIKES ARE GOING DOWN, BUT THAT’S OKAY.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
(The ones on my facebook business page.)⁣⁣
⁣
Look what has been revealed! I posted this last friday on my facebook page. Since then they have mentioned the underground tunnels and human trafficking! The truth is revealing itself slowly, but surely👍⁣
⁣
This is what I wrote...⁣
⁣⁣
My page is about coming into WHOLENESS through self-LOVE.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
However, love DOESN’T end with us. As we love and respect ourselves, we won’t be able to look away when someone else suffers, especially innocent children💜👼💜⁣⁣
⁣⁣
This isn’t anything political either. This is about humanity. Our lives as ONE.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
I share my beliefs with you guys. Just take what resonates with you☺️⁣⁣
⁣⁣
This has been heavy on my heart the past few weeks...⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Thousands of children are being rescued from slavery, abuse and torture. Some will have never seen sunlight😞⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The big white ships are sent out to aid in their rescue... called MERCY and COMFORT🙏⁣⁣
⁣⁣
I don’t know how they can heal from what they experienced, but all my LOVE goes out to them.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Millions have been victim to human trafficking in underground tunnels (there are maps you can find about this).⁣⁣
⁣⁣
It’s a worldwide problem. And if it takes this lockdown to do all this work, I honor staying at home.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The U.S. military, Trump and others involved are helping with this rescue.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
As much DARKNESS there is in this world, there is just as much LIGHT💜💜💜
